Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product embodies innovation and quality, designed to exceed expectations and deliver unparalleled performance. Given its exceptional features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the unique benefits and value it offers, I am offering it to you for $15000. I trust this investment will prove to be highly beneficial for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
